title: Doo-Wop Pendant Lamp Chrome
body: A modern classic lamp that directs light both vertically and horizontally, the Doo-Wop Pendant Lamp provides glare-free light. A warm, diffused tone of light is created by the inner conical shade. The outer, rolled edges shade contributes to the upward and downward direction of light. Originally introduced in the 1950's, this Mobelaris replica is a timeless classic that brings unique lighting in any room setting.
